title: Tourism squad effectively working in facilitating tourists
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 22 (APP):The Punjab Tourism Squad (PTS) Murree was effectively working to provide all kinds of facilities and guidance to tourists thronging to the recreational spots of the area.
Tourism squad also issued warning to the hotels and restaurants management to ensure cleanliness and provide tourists with a comfortable environment and quality food to enjoy their trip, said a press release issued here on Monday.
Speaking on the occasion, Assistant Director Operations Syed Khurram Hasan said that the Punjab Tourism Squad will take all possible measures in collaboration with the local government for facilitating the tourists.
He said that tourism squad would take all possible steps to provide neat & clean ambiance, supply of quality food and other necessary facilities to the tourists.
He said that tourists can contact with Punjab Tourism Squad helpline 1421 in case of any problem to avoid untoward incident.
